div.p: FFA, Football, Volleyball, Basketball, Baseball and Track
Memories abound at Grady's unique middle/high school!

Grady Municipal Schools would like to welcome you to our Grady website! Feel free to explore the web space by checking out some of our features including: calendars, news, and school resources. We try to keep this up to date so you will know what we have going on here at Grady Schools. Feel free to call the office (575-357-2192) if you have any questions.

span.strong:
Please sign-up for our texting service! You will need to sign up in order to receive school texts concerning delays, closures, games, etc.
To Sign up...
Parents and Students:
Text: @gradytxt to the number 81010
Grady Community:
Text: @gradycomm to the number 81010
